prescription.description: 3 min light row to raise HR, then 8x30 sec On / 30 sec Off @ 20-22 SPM, build power slightly each rep
3 rounds: 10 Frog Stretch (dynamic), 10 Hip Airplanes, 10 Cat-Cow
5 Rounds: 10 Arms, 10 Arms+Body, 10 Arms+Body+Half-Slide, 10 powerful strokes @ Rate 24, focus on leg drive & calm recovery, rest 60 sec
prescription.notes: easy - its a skill not a workout - focus on being better!

prescription.description: Row 1,000 m - single effort. Target rate 24-26 SPM. Open the first 200 m controlled, accelerate into sustainable pace
prescription.notes: Record: Total time, Avg Split/500 m, Avg SPM, Overall RPE, any pain/fatigue notes

prescription.description: 3 rounds: 12 V-Ups, 15 Superman Raises, 20 KB Russian Twists (light), 30 Hollow Rocks, rest as needed
